item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, May 9, 2025 at 4:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. ALICE detects the conversion of lead into gold at the LHC (118 points | 69 comments)
2. Sofie: open-source web based system for automating live TV news production (124 points | 15 comments)
3. Show HN: Aberdeen – An elegant approach to reactive UIs (116 points | 52 comments)
4. 21 GB/s CSV Parsing Using SIMD on AMD 9950X (105 points | 34 comments)
5. Itter.sh – Micro-Blogging via Terminal (58 points | 21 comments)
6. Former Supreme Court Justice David Souter Dies at 85 (6 points | 1 comment)
7. Show HN: Hyvector – A fast and modern SVG editor (147 points | 37 comments)
8. Data manipulations alleged in study that paved way for Microsoft's quantum chip (121 points | 79 comments)
9. LegoGPT: Generating Physically Stable and Buildable Lego (446 points | 118 comments)
10. Show HN: A backend agnostic Ruby framework for building reactive desktop apps (5 points | discuss)
11. Show HN: BlenderQ – A TUI for managing multiple Blender renders (3 points | discuss)
12. Past, Present, and Future of Sorbet Type Syntax (4 points | discuss)
13. CryptPad: An Alternative to the Google Suite (40 points | 14 comments)
14. NSF faces shake-up as officials abolish its 37 divisions (207 points | 283 comments)
15. A Taxonomy for Rendering Engines (18 points | 2 comments)
16. Implementing a Struct of Arrays (66 points | 25 comments)
17. The CL1: the first code deployable biological computer (10 points | 4 comments)
18. The birth of AI poker? Letters from the 1984 WSOP (10 points | discuss)
19. Amazon's Vulcan Robots Now Stow Items Faster Than Humans (127 points | 134 comments)
20. Structuring Competency-Based Courses Through Skill Trees (27 points | 13 comments)
21. Reconstructing illusory camouflage patterns on moth wings using computer vision (8 points | discuss)
22. Dasung Paperlike 13K is a 13.3 inch E Ink color monitor (41 points | 17 comments)
23. The Linux Kernel's PGP Web of Trust (40 points | 6 comments)
24. Hollow Core Fiber (HCF) (28 points | 15 comments)
25. Entire BART system is down due to computer systems failure (98 points | 50 comments)
26. Zombieverter: Open source VCU for reusing salvage EV components (56 points | 18 comments)
27. Starlink User Terminal Teardown (240 points | 78 comments)
28. USPTO refuses Tesla Robotaxi trademark as "merely descriptive" (53 points | 14 comments)
29. WASM 2.0 (230 points | 111 comments)
30. Malaya's Timeless Design (53 points | 8 comments)
